description:
Hina and Matsuri might be friends, but there can only be one PriMagi superstar! Which of their stars is about to rise, and whose will come falling back to earth?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Matsuri Versus Hina: Phoenix wa Dochira ni Hohoemu?
Matsuri vs Hina: Upon Whom Will the Phoenix Smile?
まつりVS[バーサス]ひな フェニックスはどちらに微笑む?
